Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: w. stanley
Reviews.Content: Great product. Took some time understanding windows 8 but a good computer for a college kid.  Light weight and fast

Reviews.Title: Very good price, Very light weight, Very fast computer. Great deal.
Reviews.Author: Raymond P. Duhon
Reviews.Content: It's tough to get used to the change from Vista to Windows 8. But the computer is very light, very fast and doesn't get as hot on my lap as my old, heavy Toshiba laptop. My wife and I both like it due to the size and weight. It is amazing what a few years does in technology.Love the keyboard with a number pad on the right side, like my old computer. Most computers this size don't have this. It is good when you work with numbers a lot like me. And the price was the best deal.

Reviews.Title: Bought it as a birthday gift.
Reviews.Author: Rwong "Rwong"
Reviews.Content: My friend needed a new computer so I bought him a laptop.  I was looking for a laptop that was simple to use.  I was glad that when he got it, it was easy for him to use.  I do not know a whole lot about this laptop but I do know my friend was happy and he loves using it.  It does video great and he uses it for simple streaming and surfing the Internet.  Can't complain too much about that!  I thought the Windows8 system would be complicated, but he said it was pretty easy to use.  Great purchase!  I recommend since the price is right for what it does

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: phil
Reviews.Content: Christmas gift for my son and his fiancé,,,,easy set up,  quickness and the larger 15.6 " screen were a big hit with them...

Reviews.Title: Sensitive mouse
Reviews.Author: Bruce & "Mary"
Reviews.Content: The laptop does a good job "so far" since we only purchased it on September 21st 2013. The only thing is the mouse is (realy) sensitive hard to get it where you want it without bringing up all that you don't want . Color is good . Windows 8 isn't that bad at all . I would recommend it to someone that wanted a everyday computer but not to someone that wanted to play games on . Good price.

Reviews.Title: Ugh!  Soooo schloooooww!
Reviews.Author: The Pickle Pie
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my son for Christmas so he could play videogames.  Unfortunately, he can't use it because it's too slow to play most of the games he wants to play.  I don't know why this computer is advertised as a gaming-class computer.  It's not.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: A. Willsea "Movie Lady"
Reviews.Content: Will never send a lap top off again for repair.  That cost more than I got this machine for.  Works really well.  Not use to windows 8, but not a Toshiba problem.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5950
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  I have always loved Toshiba laptops.  They are easy to fix, upgrade, and are reliable.  I use a 10yo. Toshiba as a field recorder with a fire-wire interface.  A ram, OS, and hard drive upgrade was all I did and it runs awesome.  The battery is still good!  This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she also loves it.

Reviews.Title: This computer is awful.
Reviews.Author: Stardog77 "Stardog77"
Reviews.Content: I hate this computer, on which I am currently typing this scathing review. It's extremely slow to do regular, simple things.  I am no tech aficionado, so my fella says he'll look at it.  He says there's probably so much useless crap on it that it causes it to run slow. Seriously, it works so slow that it actually misses keystrokes. And Windows 8... gawd, the horror. Who would have thought any of it was a good idea??  Seriously, this slow piece-of-crap computer skipped three letters in that last sentence.  I only gave it two stars because it even started up.  I freaking hate it.

Reviews.Title: Like the star shows - - It's Okay
Reviews.Author: TravelinMan
Reviews.Content: The quality of this laptop is only average.  The space bar only works well when pushed on the left side, but I am adjusting.  I'll keep it around for awhile until I decide what to get next.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: MiSs JaCqUeLiNe
Reviews.Content: MY AUNT LOVE THIS COMPUTER VERY MUCH AND WE LOVE IT TO SO WE CAN GO TO CLASS ON IT

Reviews.Title: Fantastic deal
Reviews.Author: Felicia S.
Reviews.Content: Love the computer, it has great battery life and a lot of new features. It was a little hard to figure out out to navigate through at first.

Reviews.Title: not great but not too bad either!
Reviews.Author: eduardo dominguez
Reviews.Content: its okay for what i wanted,you know basic stuff like e-mail and youtube and a few low end games and visual novels.the processor is rather weak and the speakerphones are kind of the low end spectrum of what you might want or expect from a laptop.despite of its weak processor this machine can handle HD in a breeze.the dvd player is not too shabby as well.overall,its not great but not too bad either

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5950 16-inch Laptop (1.3 GHz AMD E-Series...
Reviews.Author: Elio Platias "Elio Plat"
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE EVER LAPTOP DONT BUY, THIS LAPTOP WITH WIN 8 ITS THE MOST HORRIBLE YOU CANT BUY IN YOU LIFE.................

Reviews.Title: problems to turn on
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: I didn't use it much and I had problems to turn it on. I've recently started using it, I have not much to say apart from that

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD E-300 1.3GHz 1MB L2 cache processor, Genuine Windows 8 operating system
15.6" widescreen HD TruBrite LED Backlit display, 1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content, AMD Radeon™ HD 6310 Graphics
4GB DDR3 1600MHz memory, Memory Card Reader
500GB HDD (5400rpm, Serial ATA), DVD-SuperMulti drive, 3-USB (2.0)
HD Webcam and Microphone, Wi-Fi Wireless networking (802.11b/g/n), Up to 3.77 hours battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C855D-S5950 16-inch Laptop (1.3 GHz AMD E-Series Processor E-300, 4GB Ram, 500GB Hard drive, Windows 8) Satin Black Trax
